item.title: Caplin Point Lab: Company Completes INVIMA-Colombia Inspection At Puducherry Injectable Facility
item.description: Top News Caplin Point Lab: Company Completes INVIMA-Colombia Inspection At Puducherry Injectable Facility 5 minutes ago Caplin Point Laboratories has successfully completed a regulatory inspection by INVIMA-Colombia at its Puducherry injectables manufacturing facility. The five-day inspection demonstrates compliance with Colombian regulatory standards and strengthens the company's Latin American expansion strategy, complementing its already approved Softgel section at the same facility.

item.title: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close
item.description: Market Wrap: Nifty and Sensex Climb Over 0.5% in Positive Close 2 hours ago Indian markets closed positively on December 12, with Nifty 50 breaching 26,000 and Sensex surpassing 85,000. The session saw a broad-based rally with 61% of traded stocks advancing. InterGlobe Aviation clarified no SEBI investigation and disclosed a CGST penalty. Infosys witnessed significant promoter share sales.

item.title: Reliance Retail Considers IPO Within Three Years
item.description: Reliance Retail Considers IPO Within Three Years 9 hours ago Reliance Retail, India's largest retail chain and a subsidiary of Reliance Industries, has announced plans to potentially launch an Initial Public Offering (IPO) within the next three years. This move could provide investors an opportunity to participate in India's retail sector growth, enhance the company's access to capital, and increase operational transparency. As India's largest retail chain, Reliance Retail's potential IPO could be a significant event in the Indian market.

item.title: Sungrowth Share Stocks Limited Releases Pledge on 1.49 Crore Shares of Incredible Industries
item.description: Sungrowth Share Stocks Limited Releases Pledge on 1.49 Crore Shares of Incredible Industries 18 minutes ago Sungrowth Share Stocks Limited has released a pledge on 1,48,83,750 shares (31.83% of total share capital) of Incredible Industries Limited. The pledge was previously held in favor of SREI Infrastructure Finance Limited. This action removes all encumbrances on Sungrowth's promoter holdings in Incredible Industries, shifting their entire stake from pledged to free shares while maintaining their 31.83% ownership.
